# Monte Carlo Simulation of Wang2001

# Data generation

$x_i$ is i.i.d. Bernoulli random variables.

## $P(X_i = 0) = 1$

```{r}
n <- 400
x <- rep(FALSE, n)
z <- (1-x) * runif(n, 0.5, 1.5) + x * runif(n, 1.5, 4)/2.5
Z <- exp(-x * log(2.75)) * z
lambda_0 <- function(t) 0.6 + (t - 6)^3 / 360
gamma <- 1
exp(x * gamma)
```
